Port of PR #241 (#242)

Missing return code was creating incorrect Kodi log messages.  Currently Kodi core  ignores the client error when returned.   Read LiveStreams.xml to string buffer instead of file.  Remove unused legacy DoRequest  check.

commit.message:
Wakeup improvements (#236)

* Add channel error return

Add return error if core requests channels while not connected.  Will occur after wake.

* Wake connection improvement

After wake network and local server may not be available try fast poll to speed up connection

* Fanart changes

Default recording request to fanart.  Override default EPG art request to landscape.

verification.payload:
tree 55bb00e13af7be69e2a4e8de72acd8821040a4de
parent 3cb534160fbe52cc10bbe18a838b59f183f09eaa

committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1686174147 +1200

Wakeup improvements (#236)

* Add channel error return

Add return error if core requests channels while not connected.  Will occur after wake.

* Wake connection improvement

After wake network and local server may not be available try fast poll to speed up connection

* Fanart changes

Default recording request to fanart.  Override default EPG art request to landscape.

commit.message:
Connection state change (#232)

Change initial connection to connecting state and defer going into unreachable state to avoid event disruption on startup.

Co-authored-by: emveepee <nospam>

commit.message:
Add support for multiple backends (#223)

* Create multi instance model

Using pvr.hts as a template remove singletons and update to instance-settings.xml

* Settings migration

Use pvr.hts model to import settings.xml to instance-settings

* Instance folders

Use folder of pvr.nextpvr for icons, and other instance related files.

* Tinyxml2 migration

Use tinyxml2 for migration.  Using Kodi based migration creates an unnecessary global settings.

* Add instance settings

Allow more configuration of individual instances.  Add instance "all channels" groups.

* Prioritize first instance

Add possibility that  first instance is not 1.  Only used for labelling since instance priority order is not provided by core.

* Timer instance descriptions

Add instance information to timer descriptions.  Fix issue that core assumes first (default) timer type is will not be filtered.

* Configure update heartbeat

All update check polling to be sent less frequently (default remains every 60 seconds).  Primarily for single clients controlled only by Kodi or for Live TV only users.

* Sync of addon metadata translations (#219)

Co-authored-by: AlwinEsch <AlwinEsch@users.noreply.github.com>

* State change improvements

Addon was misusing the message in the API.  Improve logic on recovery from sleep

* Happy New Year

Most files are changing for multi instance anyway

* Change instance creation/deletion

Server discovery logic needed to be changed for instance settings logic.  Remove instance cache when core deletes the instance settings file after user deletes the instance.

Co-authored-by: emveepee <nospam>
Co-authored-by: github-actions[bot] <41898282+github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: AlwinEsch <AlwinEsch@users.noreply.github.com>

verification.payload:
tree 0de0c316cd9e0b7578f0ba7f99740466653d5f1a
parent b88472c4e8175decf421b78009c7f37217c73557

committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1673800251 +1300

Add support for multiple backends (#223)

* Create multi instance model

Using pvr.hts as a template remove singletons and update to instance-settings.xml

* Settings migration

Use pvr.hts model to import settings.xml to instance-settings

* Instance folders

Use folder of pvr.nextpvr for icons, and other instance related files.

* Tinyxml2 migration

Use tinyxml2 for migration.  Using Kodi based migration creates an unnecessary global settings.

* Add instance settings

Allow more configuration of individual instances.  Add instance "all channels" groups.

* Prioritize first instance

Add possibility that  first instance is not 1.  Only used for labelling since instance priority order is not provided by core.

* Timer instance descriptions

Add instance information to timer descriptions.  Fix issue that core assumes first (default) timer type is will not be filtered.

* Configure update heartbeat

All update check polling to be sent less frequently (default remains every 60 seconds).  Primarily for single clients controlled only by Kodi or for Live TV only users.

* Sync of addon metadata translations (#219)

Co-authored-by: AlwinEsch <AlwinEsch@users.noreply.github.com>

* State change improvements

Addon was misusing the message in the API.  Improve logic on recovery from sleep

* Happy New Year

Most files are changing for multi instance anyway

* Change instance creation/deletion

Server discovery logic needed to be changed for instance settings logic.  Remove instance cache when core deletes the instance settings file after user deletes the instance.

Co-authored-by: emveepee <nospam>

commit.message: increase version to 20.3.0 (API related)

Misc updates for v20 (#214)

* Recording directory update

Provide an option to sort recordings into their respective named directory order.

* Faster polling for initial connections

For the first 65 seconds try to login every 5 seconds after connection fails.  Firewalled connections might have a 30 second timeout so in that case there is only one additional connection

Co-authored-by: emveepee <nospam>
